00032 #ifndef _rvalue_h
00033 #define _rvalue_h
00034 
00041 class rvalue {
00042 private:
00043     BaseType *value;
00044     btp_func func;      // pointer to a function returning BaseType *
00045     std::vector<rvalue *> *args;        // arguments to the function
00046 
00047 public:
00048     typedef std::vector<rvalue *>::iterator Args_iter ;
00049     typedef std::vector<rvalue *>::const_iterator Args_citer ;
00050 
00051     rvalue(BaseType *bt);
00052     rvalue(btp_func f, vector<rvalue *> *a);
00053     rvalue();
00054 
00055     virtual ~rvalue();
00056   string value_name();
00057 
00058   BaseType *bvalue(const string &dataset, DDS &dds);
00059 };
00060 
00061 // This type def must come after the class definition above. It is used in
00062 // the Clause and DDS classes.
00063 typedef std::vector<rvalue *> rvalue_list;
00064 typedef std::vector<rvalue *>::const_iterator rvalue_list_citer ;
00065 typedef std::vector<rvalue *>::iterator rvalue_list_iter ;
00066 
00067 BaseType **build_btp_args(rvalue_list *args, DDS &dds);
